parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
A pattern, example; a form, sample. From a compound of hupo and a derivative of tupos; typification under, i.e. a sketch for imitation.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From hugies; to have sound health, i.e. Be well; figuratively, to be uncorrupt.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
